::Prowl/Firearm::

Prowl sighed as he watched the jet fly up and attack. "Don't they 
ever give up?" he said to no one in particular.

Prowl swooped down toward Triggerhappy, firing two signature-seeking 
mini-missiles from both of his wing guns. He had no doubt that he 
could win this with his new body.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm watched Prowl engage the enemy. He also lowered altitude, 
firing five laser bolts at Triggerhappy.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Triggerhappy::
> 
> 
>         Triggerhappy flies at full speed, and maybe an hour or 
probably more he comes to a Maximal base.  The CF of course.
> 
>          "Attack!!!!" He yells, not knowing if the others had 
caught up yet.
> 
>           Triggerhappy, who is still in his jet mode, swerves down 
and fires his jet cannons at the base, missing the Brotherhood.
